description: This file defines interfaces for controller-related functionalities within the WPEFramework, including system management, discovery, configuration, lifecycle management, and metadata. It contains multiple interface classes with virtual methods for remote procedure calls and event notifications.

classes.name: ISystemManagement
classes.description: Interface providing system management functions such as rebooting, deleting files, cloning plugins, and environment variable access.

classes.name: IDiscovery
classes.description: Interface for initiating network discovery and retrieving discovery results.

classes.name: IConfiguration
classes.description: Interface for storing and retrieving plugin configuration data.

classes.name: ILifeTime
classes.description: Interface managing plugin lifecycle states, including activate, deactivate, suspend, resume, and event notification registration.

classes.name: ILifeTime::INotification
classes.description: Nested interface for receiving notifications about plugin state changes.

classes.name: IMetadata
classes.description: Interface providing access to system metadata including proxies, status, links, process info, subsystems, version, and call stack.

methods.name: Reboot
methods.description: Reboots the device.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Removes the contents of a specified directory from persistent storage.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Creates a clone of a plugin with a new callsign.

methods.name: Environment
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a specified environment variable.

methods.name: StartDiscovery
methods.description: Starts network discovery using SSDP.

methods.name: DiscoveryResults
methods.description: Provides the SSDP network discovery results.

methods.name: Persist
methods.description: Stores the current configuration to persistent memory.

methods.name: Configuration (getter)
methods.description: Retrieves the configuration value for a specified callsign.

methods.name: Configuration (setter)
methods.description: Sets the configuration value for a callsign.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a sink for plugin lifecycle notifications.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered sink.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates a plugin by callsign.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates a plugin by callsign.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks a plugin as unavailable for interaction.

methods.name: Hibernate
methods.description: Hibernates a plugin with a specified timeout.

methods.name: Suspend
methods.description: Suspends a plugin.

methods.name: Resume
methods.description: Resumes a suspended plugin.

methods.name: Proxies
methods.description: Provides current proxy details.

methods.name: Status
methods.description: Provides status information about a plugin.

methods.name: Links
methods.description: Provides current connection details.

methods.name: ProcessInfo
methods.description: Provides framework process information.

methods.name: Subsystems
methods.description: Provides active subsystem details.

methods.name: Version
methods.description: Provides version information of WPEFramework.

methods.name: CallStack
methods.description: Provides call stack information associated with a thread index.

ctags.name: IConfiguration
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IConfiguration : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IDiscovery
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IDiscovery : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: ILifeTime
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL ILifeTime : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IMetadata
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IMetadata : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: ISystemManagement
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL ISystemManagement : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
